metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13112 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
get_l2len in common/get.c in Tcpreplay 4.3.0 beta1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via crafted packets, as demonstrated by tcpprep.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13112` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1build1').
